q.quote: If you go anywhere, even paradise, you will miss your home.
q.author: Malala Yousafzai

q.quote: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
q.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

q.quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
q.author: Malala Yousafzai

q.quote: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
q.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

q.quote: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six.
q.author: Yogi Berra

q.quote: You can find peace amidst the storms that threaten you.
q.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

q.quote: The more you sweat in peace, the less you bleed in war.
q.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

q.quote: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
q.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

q.quote: History is a gallery of pictures in which there are few originals and many copies.
q.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

q.quote: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
q.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

q.quote: All that I am, or hope to be, I owe to my angel mother.
q.author: Abraham Lincoln

q.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
q.author: Abraham Lincoln

q.author: Abraham Lincoln
